Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Total time between SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion and Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to be followed by Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Average duration of SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion when followed by SW-Checklist Completed versus when followed by SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Time from SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to SW-Awaiting AE Assignment across variants ending in SW-EIC Reject
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion and SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in complex reviewer assignment variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Average time until SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion is succeeded by any checklist-related activity (e.g., SW-Checklist Completed, SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days, SW-Checklist Completion now due)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Total time from SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to the first occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that eventually reach a decision
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants where SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs at least once
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to SW-EIC Accept compared to SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit in variants that include SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Duration between SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion and the earliest reminder activity (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1) in prolonged review paths
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Time from SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to SW-AE Assign Reviewers in variants that involve multiple reviewer declines or unavailability events
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Cycle time of SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion measured as the interval between its timestamp and the next distinct non-system confirmation activity
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion when the subsequent path includes Immediate Reject Decision from the Checklist versus standard progression
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'Immediate Reject Decision from the Checklist'
